title: Laser
description: A Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation (LASER) is a device that emits light through a process of optical amplification based on the stimulated emission of electromagnetic radiation.

Type.description: Type is the general category of laser.

LaserMedium.description: The Medium attribute specifies the actual lasing medium for a given laser type.

Tuneable.description: Whether or not the laser is Tuneable.

Pulse.description: The Pulse mode of the laser.

PockelCell.description: If true the laser has a PockelCell to rotate the polarization of the beam.

RepetitionRate.description: The is the rate in Hz at which the laser pulses if the Pulse type is 'Repetitive' hertz[Hz]

Name.description: A user defined name for this component.

ID.description: A LightSource ID must be specified for each light source, and the individual light sources can be referred to by their LightSource IDs (eg from Channel).

NominalPower.description: The nominal power of the light-source

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of this component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of this component

SpecsFile.description: Provide the location of a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: The AnnotationRef element is a reference to an element derived from the CommentAnnotation element, which consists of a simple comment multi-line annotation.

Pump.description: The Pump element is a reference to a LightSource. It is used within the Laser element to specify the light source for the laser's pump (if any).

ID.description: A unique identifier for this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
